messages.subject: Ren!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: You look SO good!! I picked up a copy of People today and there was your beautiful family! I just couldn t get over it.  And you all look so, well, normal.
messages.messageBody:
You look SO good!! I picked up a copy of People today and there was your
beautiful family! I just couldn't get over it. And you all look so, well,
normal. You don't have any pink streaks, all the children (aside from
Trevor) have their normal color hair and Sierra isn't wearing one of her
homemade fashions. I almost didn't recognize you all! :-) The article was
good. I only skimmed through it quickly at the store, but will sit back and
absorb it later. Congratulations for bringing unschooling to a wider
market!!

--
Michelle
Independent Kitchen Consultant #413652
The Pampered Chef
850-474-0817
http://www.pamperedchef.biz/michellelr
Ask me how you can save 60% on some of our most favorite products!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
